content: प्रस्तावः {@--1@} Beginning, commencement. {@--2@} An introduction. {@--3@} Mention, allusion, reference; नाममात्रप्रस्तावः <ls>Ś. 7.</ls> {@--4@} An occasion, opportunity, time, season; fit or proper time; त्वराप्रस्तावोयं न ख परिहासस्य समयः <ls>Māl. 9. 44</ls>; शिष्याय बृहतां पत्युः प्रस्तावमदिशद् दृशा <ls>Śi. 2. 68.</ls> {@--5@} The occasion of a discourse, subject, topic. {@--6@} The prologue of a drama; see प्रस्तावना below. {@--7@} The prelude or introductory words of a {%Sāman%}. {@--8@} An introductory praise. (प्रस्तावे {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} on a suitable occasion, seasonably. प्रस्तावेन {1} incidentally, occasionally. {2} suitably).
